docs.snippet: Unless Mr. Trump divests his businesses, there will be no way to know if his actions in office are for the public good or for his own financial gain....
docs.lead_paragraph: Unless Mr. Trump divests his businesses, there will be no way to know if his actions in office are for the public good or for his own financial gain.
docs.abstract: Editorial argues Pres-elect Donald J Trump's plan to give control of his business empire to his children presents intractable conflict of interest; notes divesting himself of his assets, as most presidents have done, is highly improbable; calls on Congress, press and public to be vigilant in identifying possible violations during Trump's presidency, and to protect integrity of American government.

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court turned down an attempt by Mr. Trump to block the construction of turbines near his luxury golf resort in northeast Scotland....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court turned down an attempt by Mr. Trump to block the construction of turbines near his luxury golf resort in northeast Scotland.
docs.abstract: British court denies Donald J Trump's bid to prohibit development of offshore wind farm near his Scottish golf resort; Trump official derides approval process for project, and claims it will be disastrous for local economy; resort itself overcame significant local opposition before opening in 2012.

headline.main: British Court Rejects Donald Trump’s Attempt to Block Wind Farm
headline.print_headline: Trump Loses Bid to Block Wind Farm Near Scottish Resort

docs.snippet: The road to freedom still recalls fallen heroes, but their names are fading from the sidewalk.    In the mid-60's, at the height of the civil rights movement, the city dedicated a tiny strip tucked behind West End Avenue as Freedom Place. The stre...
docs.lead_paragraph: The road to freedom still recalls fallen heroes, but their names are fading from the sidewalk. In the mid-60's, at the height of the civil rights movement, the city dedicated a tiny strip tucked behind West End Avenue as Freedom Place. The street, between West 66th and West 70th Streets, was named in honor of three civil right volunteers, including two New Yorkers, who were killed in Mississippi in 1964.
docs.abstract: Article on renewed push to have monument to Michael Schwerner, James Chaney and Andrew Goodman, civil rights workers killed in Mississippi in 1964, installed at Freedom Place in Manhattan, where Trump Organization is building complex along Hudson River; photo (M)

headline.main: Names Fade From a Street, But Not From Memories

headline.main: Hidden Cracks Found in Rotor In Trump Crash

docs.lead_paragraph: James B. Comey said that the agency is investigating Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election. Regarding President Trump’s tweets about alleged wiretapping by the Obama administration, Mr. Comey said the agency has “no information that supports those tweets.”
